pages.text: The Pulverizer is a machine that crushes items and ores. Improves ore yields, which can be further increased using augments and $(l:thermal:world/materials/catalysts)catalysts$(/l).

pages.title: 增強相容性
pages.text: $(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/integral_components)整合組件$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/item_filter)物品篩選器$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)知識濃縮器$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil)擴展通量線圈$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_storage)穩態通量線圈$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/rf_coil_xfer)強導通量線圈$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_speed)通量鏈結放大器$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_efficiency)通量效率升級$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_output)輔助處理篩$(/l)$(li)$(l:thermal:technology/augments/machine_catalyst)催化回收室$(/l)
